name: Join Hands (post-jam)
description:
THIS IS THE POST JAM VERSION, WITH SOUNDS! We work 4 more hours after the end of the initial deadline to finish this game. We hope you'lle enjoy the game.

Made  in less than 2 days for the GMTK gamejam. 

  • Art: Garance Royère
  • Design and code: Géraud Zucchini
  • Title music: Antoine Druaux
